sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core' import { FormGroup, FormControl, Validators } from '@angular/forms' @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'], }) export class LoginComponent { loginForm = new FormGroup({ userName: new FormControl(' ', [Validators.required]), password: new FormControl(''), }) get f() { return this.loginForm.controls } }
